TopicTitle: Is IVA just not in the game yet?

Articles.Content: Tried to IVA and no matter what it wouldn't work. I assume since the game has just barely released that IVA won't be coming anytime soon?

Correct, it's not in the game yet.

As to when it'll be patched in? Nobody knows. It's not an explicitly named roadmap item. It might come this week, or it might come in a year.
Interestingly there's already a mod for it.

At least you can look into the cockpit/pod now!

IVA will follow I guess

I had hoped to find some working instruments to allow full IVA flights.

*Engaging hopful mode* Well, not maybe from the start, but actually not having it included leaves some hopes that it will be properly done when added.
Im a big fan of running IVA, dared to hope to have in depth IVA missions stock as I did with modded KSP1
